data_description.location: Use the map to set the location for Stookwijzer.

user.description: Select the location you want to recieve the Stookwijzer information for.

location_migration_failed.description:
The Stookwijzer integration was unable to automatically migrate your location to a new format the updated integrations uses.

Make sure you are connected to the internet and restart Home Assistant to try again.

If this doesn't resolve the error, remove and re-add the integration.
location_migration_failed.title: Migration of your location failed
